actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of excess earnings an individual may earn before suffering deductions from benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to set increased monthly limits on the amount OASDI beneficiaries who have attained retirement age and other OASDI beneficiaries may earn in a taxable year ending after 1991 and before 1993 before incurring a benefit reduction.

titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of excess earnings an individual may earn before suffering deductions from benefits.
